message: Operation 'get_/api/Section/{sectionId},{step}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context, unclear_purpose. This helps AI agents understand the hierarchical nature of Erskine May and when to use this operation versus the full section detail endpoint.

data.current_summary: Returns a section overview by section id and step.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve Erskine May section overview by step
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves an overview of a specific Erskine May section at a particular hierarchical step or level. The sectionId identifies the section and step indicates the structural level (e.g., part, chapter, section). Returns an ErskineMaySectionOverview object containing summary information and structural metadata for that level. Useful for navigating the hierarchical structure of Erskine May.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses unclear terminology ('step' is unexplained). Description is completely missing. Added clarification that 'step' refers to hierarchical levels, specified the return type (ErskineMaySectionOverview), and explained the use case for navigation. This helps AI agents understand the hierarchical nature of Erskine May and when to use this operation versus the full section detail endpoint.
